Is it wise to be a mile chaser with just average $600 monthly spend ? Plan on using CRMC amaze
I tried yesterday  no more live chat anymore.
give you some stats:$600 per month = 2 400 milesto redeem a decent ONE WAY business class ticket to Japan = 52k milesthat is 52 000 / 2 400 = 21.6 months
the good news is i don't expect anyone to only have consistently $600 monthly credit card spend throughout their lives
pay for friends when out for meals + get DBS altitude to pay for cheaper miles to hit sooner
Just remember to check out the exclusions before using the card

The promo period for the UOB Foreign currency promotion is from 8 Nov to 31 Dec 2024
So just checking with allIf you made a transaction earlier in the promo period but only registered later  are those transactions counted towards earning the bonus miles?
I think for uob is from reg onward. U can check tnc
Yes. I did check but its not clear in tnc. Basically they said all txns are valid within the promo period and u just need to register once

PSA: If anyone booked Expedia using Shopback 12/12 promo between 12-2am  please URGENTLY check your tracked cashback. It is supposed to be 14.5% but all my bookings are now tracked only at 12.5%.If you are affected  I urge you to reach out to Shopback to get them to ADJUST the Tracked Cashback NOW.I contacted them of this issue and they gave some stupid excuse that they cannot investigate further until 120 days later. What nonsense.More of us contact them to make noise  the faster they will act.
